sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { FaSave, FaTimes, FaEdit, FaTrash, FaSyringe } from 'react-icons/fa'; const StudentRow = ({ student, index, isEditing, isBooking, editData, setEditData, handleSave, handleVaccinationSave, handleMarkAsVaccinated, handleEditClick, handleBookClick, handleDelete }) => { const editableFields = !editData.bookingStatus || editData.bookingStatus === 'Pending' || editData.bookingStatus === 'Not Approved'; return ( {isEditing ? ( <> {editableFields ? ( setEditData({ ...editData, name: e.target.value })} className="border p-2 rounded-lg w-full" /> ) : editData.name} {editableFields ? ( setEditData({ ...editData, class: e.target.value })} className="border p-2 rounded-lg w-full" /> ) : editData.class} {editableFields ? ( setEditData({ ...editData, studentId: e.target.value })} className="border p-2 rounded-lg w-full" /> ) : editData.studentId} {editData.bookingStatus} {editData.vaccinationName} {editData.vaccinationDate ? new Date(editData.vaccinationDate).toLocaleDateString() : 'â€”'} {editData.bookingStatus === 'Approved' && editData.vaccinationStatus !== 'Vaccinated' ? ( ) : ( editData.vaccinationStatus )} ) : isBooking ? ( <> {student.name} {student.class} {student.studentId} {student.bookingStatus} setEditData({ ...editData, vaccinationName: e.target.value })} className="border p-2 rounded-lg w-full" /> setEditData({ ...editData, vaccinationDate: e.target.value })} className="border p-2 rounded-lg w-full" /> {editData.vaccinationStatus || 'Not Vaccinated'} ) : ( <> {student.name} {student.class} {student.studentId} {student.bookingStatus} {student.vaccinationName} {student.vaccinationDate ? new Date(student.vaccinationDate).toLocaleDateString() : 'â€”'} {student.vaccinationStatus} )} ); }; export default StudentRow;
